com.generalnegentropics.archis.universe
Interface Condition

All Known Subinterfaces:
Catastrophe, EnvironmentalCondition, RewardFunction
All Known Implementing Classes:
BaselineRewardFunction, BiggestRewardFunction, EnvironmentalMutationCondition, ExtinctionLevelEvent, FecundityRewardFunction, FibonacciSequenceRewardFunction, GenesisCondition, GPReproductionCondition, Irradiate, Landscape2D, LifespanCondition, RandomDeathCondition, RandomSourceCondition, ReproductionCondition, SmallestRewardFunction
public interface Condition

A condition defines some aspect of the universe relative to cells

Typically, conditions will implement one of the subclasses: EnvironmentalCondition, Catastrophe, or RewardFunction.

Conditions should contain a public static String called CONDITION_DESCRIPTION that carries a description of the condition.

Version:
2.0
Author:
Adam Ierymenko

Parameters:

preExecutionNotify

public void preExecutionNotify(Cell l)

Called before each cell execution

This method may kill the cell, and this will prevent execution but will not prevent preExecutionNotify from being called for other cells. When doing other things, alive() should be checked in the cell first to save processing time.

Parameters:
l - Cell to create input for

Parameters:
universe - Universe we exist within
simulation - Simulation currently running

                   throws ConditionExpirationException
Called before every tick begins

Throws:
ConditionExpirationException - Condition should be removed from chain

postTickNotify

public void postTickNotify()
                    throws ConditionExpirationException
Called after every tick ends

Throws:
ConditionExpirationException - Condition should be removed from chain

postTickProcessCells

public void postTickProcessCells(java.util.List cells)

Called in each thread to process batches of cells concurrently post-tick

(Called before postTickNotify())

The List given as the parameter is not modifiable. Note that anything done here must be synchronized as the whole point of this method is to enable multithreaded post-tick processing within conditions. Also note that this will be called for each thread, and so might be called more than once on multi-CPU machines. Do things that must be done only once in postTickNotify.

Parameters:
cells - List of cells to process
